attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This app hacked all my information within minutes of downloading it.  It deleted my tik tok & now has access to everything. Heart been broke so many times💔😔

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
attributes.review: I downloaded this app, and almost immediately hated it. I deleted the app and five minutes later, a black limousine pulled up outside my house. I answered the door to see 3 men dresssed in all black and told me to redownload the app.

attributes.title: BAD APP!
attributes.review: App has hacked straight into my tinder account. All of my tinder matches have gotten 14 messages saying "what's poppin baby, u planning on voting for trump? ahaaha". Have literally had to delete my tinder account because of the embarrassment caused. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: This app took so long to download and when it finally did it ruined my phone and I think it got a virus from it. Don’t buy this app.

attributes.title: DO NOT BUY 😥😱🙏
attributes.review: this app ruined my LIFE. i can’t even bear to look at it in my downloaded apps anymore because of the sheer TORTURE it put me through. please, for the safety of you and your family, DO NOT download it!!!!

attributes.title: Practically Perfect Every Way
attributes.review: Absolute trash app! This downloaded so many viruses and wanted my credit card information! Now way am I giving the Orange Cheeto money!!! Anyways, DO NOT DOWNLOAD (unless you are writing a review) 😇 🧚‍♀️ 🧚‍♂️

attributes.title: Horrible app!
attributes.review: Bugs, glitches, freezes! An ad every 5 seconds! Absolutely horrible. Apple needs to delete this app and be done with it !
To start off this app took 69 hours to download and after I finally got the chance to open it, it decided to throw my cat down the stairs.  She will not recover. Needless to say do not get this app 😚

attributes.title: upset
attributes.review: as a african american female, i get bullied for liking Trump. But after downloading the app, i see more and more why i should not be liking him. I thank my friends for bullying me into not liking him

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: This app spews hate and bigotry. As does our president. He has ruined America, and makes me want to vomit every time I hear him speak. Looking at his face is a trigger to me. Therefore, this app is garbage. Please take it down.
